title: AlphaBetty's Question of the Day
content:
**[THIS](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811070925/http:/www.fontplay.com/images2/menuettotip.jpg)** is the third in a series that uses three panel strips made from doll photos I’ve taken. The eyes were empty holes, but I painted some in and used Kai’s glass filter to make it look a little reflective.

Font is Menuetto by Dieter Steffman

(These are 600 pixels wide, so I wasn’t sure what the limit is for viewing without having to scroll)

 [‹ Alpha-Betty interviewed in June issue of Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811070925/http:/typophile.com/node/19488 "Go to previous forum topic") [Doyald Young / Step Inside Design ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811070925/http:/typophile.com/node/19472 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontplayer
